node.excerpt: I wanted to create an   alias that takes a few parameters by default. But, that is not possible in PowerShell. To get around that, however…
I am in the process of overhauling my blog site hosted on Github. I have been using  Hexo  for a while for the current one as my static site…
Forwarding port 80 via SSH requires   privileges. But, if your server is setup to accept identity file only, things may not work as expected…
Kibana helps visualizing Elasticsearch data. Since Elasticsearch is based on Lucene, it's no surprise that Kibana uses Lucene query syntax…
Telnet is a useful program that can be used to test network POS printers. On Windows 10/Server 2014 however, it does not come pre-installed…

node.name: Shuhel Ahmed
node.bio: I am a very interesting guy because I like Deadpool!
